The dress looks elegant when paired with sleek leather boots, and one customer particularly appreciates the gold buttons that add style. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Navy bodycon sweater dress
items.body: This dress is beautiful in person. I haven’t tried it on yet. But, I am very familiar with this brand. The knit material is quality. It is soft, and has nice stretch. The gold buttons give the dress style and fashion. I’m 5’1, 165 pounds. I ordered a (M). It comes right above my ankles. It is flattering. It can be worn to work, date night, and church. This is a quality brand. You won’t be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Shopgirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater Dress
items.body: This is the perfect office dress. I like the color and how well it fits. I purchased another one because it’s comfortable and perfect to wear to work. Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Run Girl!!
items.body: Love it. Good quality. Doesn't look cheap and the contoured waist and bustline is everything. I want this one in every color. I'm 5,4 180 lbs. Size 16. Normally I go with an XLG but in this dress I chose Large and I'm glad I did, not too tight at all. Read more
items.author: A. M. Williams

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric
items.body: Super warm and comfy. Seems well made although I have not worn it yet. The material is nice and thick and feels soft. Not flimsy or see-through. Fits true to size. Read more
items.author: cathy raycraft

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy It!!!
items.body: I received my sweater-dress today and can't wait to wear it. It has a thick, soft sweater material that clings to your curves and will look elegant with some sleek leather boots and maybe a scarf. If longer lengths are for you, buy it. I'm looking for different colors to purchase! Read more
items.author: TMNichols

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expertly sewn with the ribbed material meeting on each side, complimenting bust, hips, and waist.
items.body: My review is for the MEROKEETY Women's Bodycon Sweater Dress 2025 Fall Winter Long Sleeve Button Crew Neck Ribbed Knit Midi Work Dresses. I ordered a small, black. Most of the clothing I receive online is shipped in a vacuum bag, and so was this one. However, it didn't wrinkle much and looked almost ready to wear. (Everything needs a first wash to get it ready.) * The fit: small size, slim, and true to size, very flattering * Material: Ribbed material pattern, soft, stretchy, comfortable, and wrinkle-free. * Weight: mid-weight, and I can see wearing it in the summer and winter, not see-through * Pattern: Ribbed material, but no other pattern * Color: As advertised, black; looks like the pictures with no deviation. * Sleeve Length: long, suitable for a tall person * Body: Slim, form-fitting, but not too tight The dress was expertly sewn with the ribbed material meeting on the sides. If you look closely at my pictures, you can see how the ribbing flows to complement your body. Also, ribbed material tends to enhance a figure as the ribbing expands around certain body parts, subtly drawing attention to your assets. The gold buttons against the black look sharp. The dress is one of my favorites, and it is suitable for work, church, an evening out, and more. The dress gets my five (5) star review for all categories. Read more
items.author: catchem35

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish Midweight Bodycon Sweater Dress
items.body: This is a cute bodycon dress for fall. For size reference I am 118 pounds, 5' 4.5", 34C. It's a lovely warm cocoa color, is a nice thickness, and has a slight ribbed patten/texture throughout. I know it's a sweater dress but the material is not a traditional fuzzy sweater material, it's more like a slightly thick lightweight knit material. I liked the midi style cut of this dress and it hits me in my upper shin area. I also liked the hammered gold metal buttons. The material is soft and (slightly) stretchy but not overly so, so if you like the style but prefer a roomier fit I would size up. I am a small in most things at 118 pounds but if I was even 10 pounds heavier I would personally size up to a medium as the small was already a little fitted/tight on me, especially in the chest area. This is a flattering style for lean and lightly curvy or athletic frames. Please note that this dress material is Not body shaping - meaning that if you have bumps and bulges, it will not hide them, and they will likely show. I hope you found the details in this review helpful! Read more
items.author: Everyday Elle

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor fit
items.body: I am 117 pounds and 5’3”. I usually wear an XS/s. This was super tight on me. The material is forgiving but I have a tiny pudge and it just highlighted it. Even with spanx. The material was comfortable and since I got a darker color it wasn’t sheer. But unless you’re comfortable wearing a dress that hides zero imperfections, this isn’t for you! The neckline is also veryyy high almost like a mock turtleneck Read more
items.author: R. Field

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, Brown, Navy, Almond, Khaki, Beige, Apricot, Black, Armygreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
